# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed

# Temporary folders
tmp/
temp/

# Node modules (if you add any build tools later)
node_modules/

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup

# Local development
.env
.env.local
